Title: The aaron application platform - all you need to create business solutions
Description: The aaron application platform offers a fundament to create individual business solutions with VisualStudio.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The aaron application platform offers a fundament to create individual business solutions with VisualStudio.


Overview

- contains 3 'ready to use' frontends (WinForms, ASP.NET and Silverlight)
- includes a complete User- and Permission administration
- supports multi-language translation
- allows future releases compatable source code extension (i.g. by using partial classes)
- is extendable by adding user controls (works like a CMS)
- comes with it's own O/R mapper

Homepage :
